title: Mercedes : market share of new car registrations in the EU 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 17 number of Months.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep 18 and lowest at Month Aug 18.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Month is 2.6.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Month Sep 18 and lowest at Month Aug 18.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 17 number of Months.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep 18 and lowest at Month Aug 18.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Month is 2.6.
max_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market share in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Market share 7.2 is found at Month Sep 18 and the minimum is found at Aug 18 where Month is 4.6.
Month Sep 19 has the second highest value for Market share.
The Market share of Month Sep 18 is 1.57% larger than the minimum value at Aug 18.
The Month Sep 18 has the highest Market share, followed by Sep 19, and Oct 18. Down to the Month Aug 18 which is the lowest.
Overall Market share has decreased over the Months.
Similar Market share is found in Month May 19, Feb 19, and Jan 19.
The highest value 7.2 at Sep 18 is almost 1.23 times larger than the average value 5.85.
